title: Shawn Achor to Deliver Keynote at Novatus Connect 2016
text:
New York Times bestselling author, expert on connection between happiness and success, to open annual Novatus user conference
Orlando, FL (PRWEB) September 24, 2015
Novatus, Inc. announced today that Shawn Achor, a leading expert on the science of happiness and meaning, will deliver the keynote address at the 2nd annual Novatus Connect user conference in Orlando, Florida.
The New York Times bestselling author of “The Happiness Advantage” and “Before Happiness,” Achor spent 12 years at Harvard, where he won over a dozen distinguished teaching awards and delivered lectures on positive psychology in what many students regarded as the most popular class on campus.
Achor’s accomplishments include a top-20 most popular of all time TED talk, with over 8 million views. His research on happiness was featured on the cover of Harvard Business Review, and his PBS-aired lecture has been watched by millions.
Registration is now open for the user conference, which will be hosted at the Rosen Centre Hotel in Orlando, Florida on February 24-26, 2016. The conference is the world’s largest event focused exclusively on users of the Novatus Contract Management software, attracting attendees who come together for two full days of professional and technical development, networking, and growth opportunities.
“We could not be more thrilled to host Shawn Achor at Novatus Connect 2016,” said Robert Gambotz, Chief Executive Officer of Novatus. “We look forward to gathering the best minds for two days of discussion and collaboration around ways to fuel contract management success and positive performance at work. This coming year we are especially delighted to have Shawn Achor as one of those minds.”
Early registration discounts are available through September 30, 2015. To register, visit http://www.novatuscontracts.com/conference .
About Novatus
Novatus is defining the future of cloud-based contract lifecycle management. Founded in 2008, Novatus, Inc. provides simple-to-deploy software solutions and unrivaled customer support to the Global 1000.
Novatus, Inc. is a privately held company headquartered in Orlando, Florida. For more information, visit http://www.novatuscontracts.com .
